name: Todays Blah
overview:
Todayâ€™s Blah is a centralized Portal for all your businessâ€™s social media needs. The concept is that you can view/update and analysis all your companies social media communications in one central locations. Enabling your company to have total control over your brand presence on the internet. Todayâ€™s Blah has links into todayâ€™s favor social networking tools from Facebook, linkedin and Myspace etc.. As the landscape of social media apps changes overtime, Todayâ€™s Blah will have the ability to change as technology advances.

Analytics of all your social media connections are a core and critical part of our software. Offering unprecedented ability to analysis all of your social media data from cross application in order to drive a single source of truth.

Today’s Blah, is a flexible cloud solution offering the ability for companies to manage, monitor and analysis their companies social media brand via a centralized web portal, mobile platform (Android, ipad and iphone).

In addition to all your social media connections, the portal also offers feeds from other sources including news etc to truly understand how your brand is performing on the internet. Competitor analysis tools allow you also to have a daily wrap of social activities and feeds from your competitors that can be further analyzed.

In summary, Today’s Blah is a self service social media portal focused on giving companies a controlled and analyzed social media strategy.
